title: Video-Based Instruction Program for Independent Coffee Preparation Task Training

context.prior_knowledge: Basic use of coffee preparation tools and understanding of simple workflows
context.additional_context: A customized training program for learners with autism spectrum disorder to enhance job adaptability, conducted in a non-real-time learning environment using digital devices. Designed around video-based instruction (VBI) strategies to promote learner independence.

learning_goals: Learners can independently perform 19 steps of coffee preparation tasks with over 80% accuracy using Video-Based Instruction (VBI)
Learners can autonomously navigate VBI clips and apply task steps using digital devices (iPad)
Learners can complete coffee preparation tasks within 10 minutes without external facilitation and meet quality standards
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
